content: भुज् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (भुजति, भुग्न) {@--1@} To bend. {@--2@} To curve, make crooked. {vII.v} {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> (भुनक्ति-भुंक्ते, भुक्त) {@--1@} To eat, devour, consume (<ab>Atm.</ab>); शयननस्थो न भुंजीत <ls>Ms. 4. 74</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 146</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 92</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To enjoy, use, possess (property, land &c.); <ls>V. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 146</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To enjoy carnally (<ab>Atm.</ab>); सदयं बुभुजे महाभुजः <ls>R. 8. 7</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 7</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 1</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 4</ls>; सुरूपं वा कुरूपं वा पुमानित्येव भुंजते <ls>Ms. 9. 14.</ls> {@--4@} To rule, govern, protect, guard (Paras.); राज्यं न्यासमिवाभुनक् <ls>R. 12. 18</ls>; एकः कृस्नां (धरित्रीं) नगरपरिघप्रांशुब हुर्भुनक्ति <ls>Ś. 2. 15.</ls> {@--5@} To suffer, endure, experionce; वृद्धो नरो दुःखशतानि भुंक्ते <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--6@} To pass, live through (as time). {@--7@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) To pass through, fulfil. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be enjoyed or eaten. {@--2@} To be possessed. {@--3@} To be brought under the influence of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (भोजयति-ते) To cause to eat, feed with. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (बुभुक्षति-ते) To wish to eat &c.

भुज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Eating, enjoying, suffering, ruling, governing; स्वधाभुज्, हुतभुज्, पाप°, क्षिति°, नही° &c. {@--2@} Useful, serviceable. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Enjoyment. {@--2@} Profit, advantage.
